summary: It's possible that Bran could be the actual cause to drive The Mad King mad.... Right?
body:
It’s possible that Bran could be the actual cause to drive The Mad King mad…. Right?

“Burn them all!” was what The Mad King heard.

blog.name: hileywwe
blog.title: My World
blog.description: Hello loves🔥 my name is Crystal ❤️/ 20 / Black 😘/ England native / Game of thrones is LIFE ♥ Star wars is LIFE 🖤/jonerys IS my life😍/kit and emilia are goals/positivity and laughter all around/ so if you don't like what I put here oh wells x

summary: I'm honestly so hyped for the Arya X Jon X Bran family reunion more then anything 👏🏾♥️
body:
I’m honestly so hyped for the Arya X Jon X Bran family reunion more then anything 👏🏾♥️

(no shade) but they never treated Jon like an outcast and a outsider like some people (👀). They really looked up to my BOI and loved him dearly. 💖💖 It’s gonna seriously DESTROY ME when they all run up and hug one another 😂 in s8

Who knows? maybe homeboi bran might magically walk again just to get up and hug Jon. 😂 or even crack a smile lmao.

Anything can happen 😁

summary:
sansa: “What happens if you put a werewolf on the moon” is a great question. Probably the best question ever.
Bran: he’d explode...
body:
sansa: “What happens if you put a werewolf on the moon” is a great question. Probably the best question ever.

Bran: he’d explode and die because there’s no oxygen on the moon.

arya: We never said we’d send him up without a suit, you absolute monster.

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

title: Heeeeyyyy
body: Hey guys! It’s me, your mum. I deleted my main! I know! Crazy…after all these years. I needed a change. Please follow this blog now for all the Isaac goodness. It’s a pretty dead and barren place in his fandom currently, but I will always post updates when I can. Just remember, this is a side blog now, and I cannot follow you back on here, but feel free to follow my main now @millkycat

tags: เกมล่าบัลลังก์
summary: To be prepared for how Season 8 may end, it might be useful to look into some of George R.R. Martin’s non-ASoIaF fiction. GRRM...
caption:
To be prepared for how Season 8 may end, it might be useful to look into some of George R.R. Martin’s non-ASoIaF fiction. GRRM in his previous works touched on some concepts and themes which will sound rather familiar to a GoT viewer.

This vid was made before the Children of the Forest became extinct in Season 6. But Bran, who’s still very much alive, could now be considered to be an extension of the Children.

There may or may not be something to this. But the vid does at least present some aspects of ASoIaF in the context of GRRM’s other writings in an interesting way.

title: Arriving in Winterfell
body:
Varys: If the Knights of the Vale are here, then where is Littlefinger?
Sansa: Lord Baelish is dead.
Arya: We killed him.
Bran: With his own dagger.

dialogue.name: Varys
dialogue.label: Varys:
dialogue.phrase: If the Knights of the Vale are here, then where is Littlefinger?

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

summary: As much as I dislike Jonsa because of their obnoxious insistence that Dany is an evil tyrant manipulated by LF 2.0 seducer of...
body:
As much as I dislike Jonsa because of their obnoxious insistence that Dany is an evil tyrant manipulated by LF 2.0 seducer of women Jon Snow, I can see why these Sansa fans are so desperate for this ship. Look at the men GRRM has canonically written as suitors for Sansa in the books: Joffrey, The Hound, LF, Tyrion, SweetRobin and Harry the Heir.

All these guys are problematic in some ways and in order to give Sansa her perfect ending, fans twist book and show canon to fit Jon in there somehow - because in their mind she just DESERVES to get her kind, brave, handsome husband and be Queen on the Iron Throne or Queen in the North etc. Never mind that in AGoT we got this exchange between Sansa and Arya:

“Go ahead, call me all the names you want,” Sansa said airily. “You won’t dare when I’m married to Joffrey. You’ll have to bow to me and call me Your Grace.” (AGOT Sansa III) 

Do people really think that GRRM is going to end this story with Sansa as any kind of Queen to whom Arya will have to bow and call ‘your grace’? 

Sansa betrays her family to marry the handsome prince and become queen and ever since GRRM has written her a story where Sansa realizes that power and beauty is not all what it’s meant to be - that handsome guys can be horrible and ugly guys can be good and that being desired for her claim is not something she wants. It’s about her rising above the superficial, to learn the game, to play the game, to really understand what power is all about.

Jonsa is just about getting Sansa what she wanted at the start of book one completely ignoring her character development and what the character herself wants by book 5

Never mind  the complete, nonsensical character assassinations that Jon, Dany, Arya and Bran fans have to put up with on their character tags to justify this shit.

Never mind that what Jon wants is never taken into consideration.  That what he wants is twisted to make it all about Sansa in some way. That his canon relationships are constantly degraded and put down.

And PS: If you subscribe to this political!Jon or seducer Jon theory, please stop calling yourself a Jon Snow fan. It’s idiotic and none of us actual Jon Snow fans believe that crap.  LF 2.0 Jon Snow is the antithesis of everything Jon is in both the books and the show and to see you guys shit on his character and what his story is about on his tags all day every day is tiresome for actual fans of the character.

As a Jon fan who also likes Arya, Dany and Bran, I don’t want to read about how it’s totally fine for Arya to be Sansa’s executioner, how Bran is out of contention for WF because he’s a cripple who can’t have children, how Dany is horribly evil and deserves to die - keep that shit to the Jonsa/Sansa tag where you can all get together and coo over how awesome Sansa is.

I am sure when the final season starts next year and Jon continues to love Dany and do his duty by Westeros, all of you so called ‘Jon Snow fans’ will show up on his tag to talk about how he is an idiot and a horrible person deserving of death. You will make long posts about how Jon is being terribly written and that’s not who Jon is and it’s fan service and that they threw Jon under the bus and how his character is dead to you etc. - because he did not fulfill the only purpose you guys have for him - marry Sansa and make her queen.

blog.name: duron1ar
blog.title: Random Thoughts
blog.description: A place for me to put all the different fanfics that I've read and enjoyed. This will pretty much have fanfics from any fandoms that I happen to be in at the moment in addition to other random things that catch my attention.

summary: Live For Just These Twenty Years (the wolves in sheep's clothing remix) - Netgirl_y2k - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R....
body:
Live For Just These Twenty Years (the wolves in sheep’s clothing remix) - Netgirl_y2k - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Marti

Political fostering, yea or nay?

(Lyanna Stark, fostered at Sunspear; Bran Stark, a ward of Pyke; Cersei Lannister, a lioness in Winterfell; Jon Snow, a southron knight)

(Lyanna Stark, fostered at Sunspear; Bran Stark, a ward of Pyke; Cersei Lannister, a lioness in Winterfell; Jon Snow, a southron knight)

trail.content_raw:
Live For Just These Twenty Years (the wolves in sheep’s clothing remix) - Netgirl_y2k - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Marti

Political fostering, yea or nay?

(Lyanna Stark, fostered at Sunspear; Bran Stark, a ward of Pyke; Cersei Lannister, a lioness in Winterfell; Jon Snow, a southron knight)

blog.name: antares-8
blog.title: Fics and AUs and Stuff
blog.description: Exactly what it says on the tin

tags: a song of ice and fire
title: The Greenseer’s Apprentice
body:
Watchers of the show and concerned book readers will be pleased to hear that the UBAU Bran is not, in fact, an emotionless robot.

Brandon Stark’s powers were recognized when he was less than a sennight old, when his parents presented him to the heart tree and Bloodraven named him his heir. He could see ghosts from an earlier age than either of his spirit-seeing siblings, ever since a random but severe infant sickness left him blind in one eye. He learned to slip his skin as a very young child, sharing the bodies of the crows and ravens that flitted about the castle. When he met and bonded with Summer, Bloodraven proclaimed him ready for more advanced training.

With help from his tutor, the singers of the song of earth, and the Green Men, Bran learned how to enter weirwood trees and view the past, the present, and even a few glimpses of the future. He saw the first human being set foot in the North, watched Torrhen Stark argue with Brandon Snow, and, at Arya’s insistence, viewed Nymeria’s landing in Dorne. Unfortunately, not even Bran is strong enough to peer through the veil that the Others have somehow placed on the first Long Night and the Night’s King’s reign.

He is no longer allowed to look up the truth behind his favorite spooky stories, not after watching the Rat King butcher the prince gave him nightmares for almost a moon.

They’re teaching him other things, too: how to carve and care for the trees, how to forge candles of glass, how to (sort of) interpret his prophetic dreams, how to craft illusions with bits of obsidian and peoples’ expectations, how to make ridiculously good shots despite his impaired vision (because let’s face it, Bloodraven was a famously good archer despite having only one eye and no depth perception. He prooooobably used at least a little magic for some of his more famous shots). Luwin is teaching him herb-craft and healing. Bran does very well in his lessons, and his teachers are already planning what they’re going to teach him as he grows older. They’re looking forward to it.

Not all of Bran’s lessons are esoteric. Like the rest of his family, he’s learning how to rule and wield weapons. He probably isn’t going to use a lot of that, but it’s always better to be safe than sorry, especially since his elder brother is almost certainly going to be in the thick of things.

Bran’s best friend is Jojen Reed, one of the highborn students of the Academy. It always makes Ned smile to see them together. He’s less thrilled about Bran’s “secret” plan to make Jojen and Arya fall in love so they can be good-brothers, even is a tiny part of him sort of hopes it succeeds.

Despite his many talents, Bran is not particularly interested in espionage. Bloodraven sort of hopes that this will change as he gets older, but, well, there’s always Arya.

In short, Bran is a talented young sorcerer-in-training who fully intends to live up to his potential without losing his humanity.
body_abstract: Watchers of the show and concerned book readers will be pleased to hear that the UBAU Bran is not, in fact, an emotionless robot.
